title: Portfolio Defender
text: Portfolio Defender is a competition in Inter IIT Tech Meet 2016.

title: Problem Statement
text: The problem statement consists of data from stock market, where we are given the return and the standard deviation of each stock. We find the optimal solution the aim is to minimize the risk and maximize the return.

title: Team
text:
